product_name: Maui Jim Baby Beach Polarized Sunglasses - Women's
long_description: The Maui Jim Baby Beach Polarized sunglasses bring aviator styling to petite faces. Polarized lenses reduce 99% of visible glare from water, snow, sand and pavement for increased visual acuity and decreased eye strain. HCL(R) Bronze lenses are ideal for variable conditions, from sun to overcast. Maui Jim PolarizedPlus(R)2 technology blocks glare and UV rays from all angles; manages harmful blue light and boosts colors for clarity and contrast. Pure titanium frames are lightweight, durable and comfortable; gloss finish for a sleek look. Nonslip silicone nose pads keep Baby Beach sunglasses in place. Aviator frames complement smaller faces and features. The Maui Jim Baby Beach Polarized sunglasses come with a protective case and cleaning cloth.
short_description: The Maui Jim Baby Beach Polarized sunglasses bring aviator styling to petite faces.
